thread.title: Cleveland's Spontaneously Combustible Games launches new board game called Pests!
thread.title_full: Cleveland's Spontaneously Combustible Games launches new board game called Pests!

author: Colin Toke, cleveland.com
title: Cleveland's Spontaneously Combustible Games launches new board game called Pests!
text: CLEVELAND, Ohio --Cleveland's Spontaneously Combustible Games announced Tuesday that it is launching a Kickstarter campaign for it's light strategy game "Pests!" Cleveland native and game designer Michael McFarland said the idea for the game started with an "unfortunate encounter" he had with...
